entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 8:33 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:33 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
